Title: Transient behaviour in RDA systems of the Schnakenberg type
Abstract: © 2014, The Author(s).Initial stages in the evolution of linear disturbances near a homogeneous equilibrium are considered for the standard Schnakenberg and modified Schnakenberg models. The focus is on a possibility of transient amplification of perturbations. It is shown that, depending on the coefficients in the governing equations, transient growth may appear in both asymptotically stable and unstable situations.
